Threadlocker is essential when doing any work to your car, especially prepping it for the track. Loose bolts should never happen! If you are a do-it-youselfer, or do much wrench turning, then you know about threadlocker (generically known as "locktite" or by the brand name Loctite). You also know a little goes a long way. This small bottle of Palm Labs Turbo-Lock red threadlock is perfect for that small job -- or a few small jobs! This tube has 10 mL (0.34 fluid ounces) of high-temp, high-strength threadlocker. This bottle comes with two ways to apply: with a squeeze or with the included brush. There are just too many different uses for this, and no mechanic or DIYer, should be without some in his or her toolbox.   Red or Blue threadlocker? Red is the highest strength so use it when the fastener will not be removed regularly or ever again. The Red will need a great amount of force to break free and maybe even heat. Blue is the medium strength and will break free with hand tools. Use it for fasteners that need extra locking protection but will be removed / disassmebled on a semi-regular basis.   Palm Labs Turbo-Lock Series 13-OR Features:
Used with a vacuum pump to seal power steering system to bleed trapped air from Fluid. Use with ES3981264 Vacuum Pump Kit.

Many BMWs, especially older models, feature pinch welds where the floor pan meets the rocker. These run from wheel-well-to-wheel-well and are an especially appealing jacking location with one shortfall - jacking on an unprotected pinch weld will frequently cause an unsightly bent and damaged weld. This damage is a quick to rust spot, being located on the lowest point of the vehicle and no longer being covered by protective ecoat, paint, or undercoat.

KBS Klean is a water based and biodegradable cleaning solution that can be brushed or sprayed on the rusty surface to strip away contaminants, grease, and chemicals from almost any surface. Klean is easy and friendly to use which makes it a great alternative to harsh solvents and other chemical strippers. Klean must be diluted with water and can be brushed or sprayed onto the surface and once dry will not leave any residue behind. Once the surface is completely dry, KBS Klean can be used with any other paints or sealants. We use Klean everywhere around our shop - wiping down tools, engine bays, in our parts washer, the shop floor, painted and bare sheetmetal, and even some wheels.   Klean is also part of the 3-step process to neutralize rust. Apply it to a rusty panel and it will strip away grease and other contaminants in preparation for rust conversion and coating. Rinse the panel and let it dry and it's ready for the next step. An oxygen-blocking additive offers corrosion protection for up to 30 days.
